title: IR Sensor Module - Infrared Obstacle Avoidance Sensor
description: The sensor module has strong adaptability to ambient light and has a pair of infrared emitting and receiving tubes. The transmitting tube emits a certain frequency of infrared rays. When the detecting direction encounters an obstacle (reflecting surface), the infrared ray is reflected by the receiving tube, After the comparator circuit processing, the green light will light up, while the signal output interface output a digital signal (a low 0V signal), through the potentiometer knob to adjust the detection range, the effective range of 2 ~ 30cm, the operating voltage of 3.3V -5V. The detection distance of the sensor can be adjusted by the potentiometer. It has the characteristics of small interference, easy assembly, and convenient use. It can be widely used in many occasions such as robot obstacle avoidance, obstacle avoidance car, pipeline counting, and black and white line tracing.Product performance

productDetails.title: Product details of IR Sensor Module - Infrared Obstacle Avoidance Sensor
features: IR Sensor Module - Infrared Obstacle Avoidance Sensor
Ideal for DIY projects and robotics
